about.subtitle: National Legal Information System of the Republic of Tunisia

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: SNIJ's mission is to democratize access to Tunisian legal information. We provide the public, legal professionals, and institutions with a modern and intuitive platform to consult, search, and analyze national legal texts.

features.title: Our Services
features.search: AI-powered smart search to quickly find relevant texts

features.alerts: Personalized alert system to follow legislative developments

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the National Legal Information System (SNIJ), you agree to be bound by these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use this service.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: SNIJ is a platform for accessing Tunisian legal information. It allows consultation, search, and analysis of national legal texts including laws, decrees, and case law.

usage.title: 3. Authorized Use
usage.content: You are authorized to use this service for information, research, and educational purposes. Any commercial use of the data without prior authorization is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information provided on SNIJ is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. For any specific legal questions, please consult a qualified legal professional.

intellectual.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: The content of SNIJ, including texts, graphics, logos, and software, is protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: SNIJ strives to maintain up-to-date and accurate information. However, we cannot guarantee completeness or accuracy and disclaim any liability for errors or omissions.

modifications.title: 7. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications take effect upon publication on the site.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: The National Legal Information System (SNIJ) is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

collection.title: 1. Data Collected
collection.content: We collect the following data: email address (for alerts), search preferences, anonymized browsing data. We do not collect any sensitive data without your explicit consent.

usage.title: 2. Data Usage
usage.content: Your data is used to: send you the legal alerts you have subscribed to, improve our services, generate anonymous usage statistics.

storage.title: 3. Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely and retained only for the time necessary to provide the service. We use security measures that comply with industry standards.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with Organic Law No. 2004-63 of July 27, 2004 on the protection of personal data, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for the site to function. No advertising tracking cookies are used. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding your personal data, contact us at: privacy@snij.tn
